This is one of my first loli doujinshi.  I took a risk looking at this kind of stuff. It was not only hated by the people around me, but some of the anime community too. I was surprised to see how many people were like me and  knew how it feels to be look down on by others for what we like. I made the right choice. I found a community of kind people who are ok with the stuff that I like and doesn't care or freak out when I say "I like lolis". And I am grateful to all you.
There are more traps than the actual pedophiles in this comment section.

From oreimo to lolicon confessions.... Now my turn, it all started when my brother said that he likes girls that is flat; at that time I liked big boobs then when I watched my all time favorite anime aka. Hidan no aria my life changed. I started liking flat girls then took a sudden turn to lolis. Never did I thought of liking lolis. Now I am here, a lolicon. When I shared this to my friends they called me a pedophile, maybe cause they stick to their so called 'morals' while hiding the fact they are more hideous than me. But I have a friend that accepts me so meh. AS LONG AS YOU KNOW THE LIMIT THEN EVERYTHING IS OKAY. Just don't let others know that you have download stash for this cause society would call this child pornography.
I'm a girl and I'm a lolicon too, it's nice to see that I'm not the only one ^_^

What a disgusting comment section, full of pedophiles, you guys are losers and I hope you all die and go to hell, so we all can be friends and make a party there, I heard there are lolis in hell.. but  seriously, I can't see nothing wrong in reading these kind of hentai, this has nothing to do with pedophilia, this is just fantasy, in real life I'm only attracted to girls who are about the same age as me (I'm 22), but you can't just say these things to other people and expect they'll understand you.
